title: GYVAS baras
description: Opened in spring 2015, and few months after cooking vegetarian food, GYVAS baras became all vegan on July 13 and is the first vegan restaurant in Lithuania. Prepares vegan food with large variety, including weekly new flavors of burgers made with ingredients like tofu or sweet potato or bean. Offers daily changing business lunch Mon-Fri. Features a selection of beer and cider including authentic Lithuanian beer ALUS.
